name: Warlocks' Duel
description:
A simple, single-player duelling card game.

Unlike in other card games, you don't play your cards. Every card in your hand will be played in order when you end your turn. Make sure you have enough energy to play them all, or discard the ones you don't want to play.

Made in about 12 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018.

Used software:
  • Unity 2018.2.6f1
  • Visual Studio
  • GIMP
Used assets:
  • "Kenney Pixel" font (https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts, CC0 1.0 Universal license)
